data.name: Birthday_query
data.description: Retrieving todays date from DOB attribute
data.queryText:
select c.FirstName As FirstName , c.LastName as LastName,
c.DOB as DOB,
c.Order_Status as Order_Status,
c.Email as Email,
c.SNO as SNO,
c.Purchase_Order as Purchase_Order,
c.Gender as Gender 
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/eedb1a73-7d0e-ed11-b844-48df37dc12d3/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/eedb1a73-7d0e-ed11-b844-48df37dc12d3/data/name}}] As c
where c.DOB >= DATEADD(DAY, -0, GETDATE())
/*  DAY(c.DOB)=29
MONTH(c.DOB)=DATENAME(MONTH,getdate())
AND DAY(c.DOB)=DATENAME(day,getdate())
 YEAR(c.DOB)=DATENAME(YEAR,getdate())  --working
DAY(c.DOB)=DATEADD(day,-1,getdate())-- not working*/
